scripts.publish:docker: docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64 -t cmdoss/walrus -t cmdoss/walrus:v0.1.1 --push .
scripts.sync:dockerhub-readme: node ../../scripts/sync-dockerhub-readme.mjs --repo cmdoss/walrus --readme ./README.md --short-description 'A decentralized storage solution powered by Sui and Walrus.'
